title: Normalize actor shape to canonical 6-field actor across policies & calls
description:
Why:
Phase 3 resources/policies must follow canonical actor shape (6 fields, user_id not id). Current codebase still uses actor(:id) and partial actors, which will cause inconsistent authorization and brittle tests.

What:
- Replace policy references actor(:id) -> actor(:user_id)
- Remove/replace partial/system actors with full 6-field actor map
- Ensure actor is passed to final Ash create/update/read/destroy calls
- Update fixtures/helpers/tests to build full actor consistently

Proof:
mix format && mix compile && mix test

title: Fix auth login rate limit regression tests
description:
Progress (2025-12-16):
- SetRateLimitContext now correctly matches POST /auth/user/password/sign_in for :login (no longer /auth/log_in).
- Regression test runs but fails with BadMapError:
  rate_limit_overrides in test config is a keyword list, but plug expects a map (Map.get/3).
Next:
- Make SetRateLimitContext.limit/1 accept keyword list or map (normalize_overrides/1), OR change test config to map.
- Ensure regression test sets conn.remote_ip (limiter uses remote_ip, not x-forwarded-for).
close_reason: Regression test fixed; limiter keys corrected and overrides normalized
